sentence.text: SLC29A3 mutations have been reported as the causal gene in two DOS families, however, genetic heterogeneity has been suggested.

TNFRSF11A mutations have previously been reported in two autosomal dominant diseases (osteolysis, familial expansile and Paget disease of bone 2, early-onset) and an autosomal recessive disease (osteopetrosis, autosomal recessive 7).
